title: Christmas Tales of Ghostly Trails: Classic Christmas Ghost Stories

sources.title: Christmas Tales of Ghostly Trails: Classic Christmas Ghost Stories (2000) Full Length
sources.description:
Christmas time – who doesn’t enjoy a good ghost story? Especially when getting kids to bed on Christmas eve. Christmas Ghosties includes the 3 spirits who appear to Scrooge in “A Christmas Carol,” a castle lodged ghost, haunted Harvington Hall and its priest holes, even Dicken’s own house. Bishop Hooper; burnt at the stake, the wonderful pin factory children. Presented in a gentle manner, ideal for young and old.

Director: Liam Dale
Writer: Sue Hosler
Stars: Liam Dale, Nick Martindale, Michael Martindale
Genre: Documentary, History, Storytelling

metadata.Plot: A retelling of the life of Charles Dickens and how he used ghosts throughout his work.
metadata.Actors: Liam Dale, Hazel Martindale, Michael Martindale
